title: Did Albert Einstein say, "We're slow to sound and light waves"?
subtitle: Einstein, who died in 1955, is likely to be eager to read many of the false quotes attributed to him on the Internet.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Albert Einstein said: "We slowed down the sound and light waves, a set of walking frequencies caught in the universe. We are spirits dressed in sacred biochemicals and our bodies are the instruments through which our souls play their music."
